success_scorecard.impact_summary: Successfully promoted Intonation Heatmaps to STABLE, providing all users with advanced visual feedback on their practice sessions.

what_went_well: Feature was already mature and well-integrated, making promotion straightforward.
Documentation updated in parallel with code changes.
unexpected_opportunities: Now that heatmaps are permanent, we can consider adding more detailed tooltips or cross-session comparisons without flag overhead.

impact_assessment.user_impact: 100% of users now have access to intonation heatmaps by default.
impact_assessment.technical_debt_reduction: Cleaned up one BETA flag; moved it to STABLE core.
